DOC.brief_summary: Men 's quality life ( QoL ) potentially affected mild erectile dysfunction ( ED ) extent moderate severe ED . This study provide control clinical data measure efficacy , QoL parameters satisfaction change men mild ED treat Viagra versus treat placebo . With open-label extension , study also provide study subject opportunity receive active drug treatment 6 week .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Of Viagra On Sexual Satisfaction Of Men With Mild Erectile Dysfunction Who Are Sexually Dissatisfied
DOC.criteria: Men age majority Mild erectile dysfunction ( IIEFEF 2225 ) sexual dissatisfaction ( IIEFOS 7 less ) Use 4 dos PDE5 inhibitor past 12 week use PDE5 inhibitor past 4 week Subjects currently take commercially available drug nondrug treatment ED
